name: Jacket Boomber
desc: A jacket is a garment worn on the upper body for warmth or fashion, typically with sleeves and a front opening.

name: Simple Pants
desc: Pants are a type of garment worn on the lower body, covering both legs, typically fastened at the waist

name: T Shirt
desc: A t-shirt is a casual, short-sleeved garment typically made of cotton, featuring a round neckline and comfortable fit.

name: Simple Hat
desc: A hat is a head-covering accessory worn for protection or fashion, typically made of fabric or straw.
